stimulusHtml:
Imagine that you are making an oral presentation to your Japanese class. First, you will read the topic for your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as full as possible.

Present your own view or perspective on Japanese toys and/or games. Discuss at least FIVE aspects or examples of Japanese toys and/or games.

Begin with an appropriate introduction, give details, explain your own view or perspective, and end with a concluding remark.

Press the record button to begin recording your presentation.
